'''Magma''' may refer to:

==''Minecraft''==
* {{BlockLink|Magma Block}}, a block which damages mobs standing on it.
* {{ItemLink|Magma Cream}}, an item used in brewing and crafting magma blocks.
* {{BlockLink|Magma block|text=Underwater magma|link=Underwater magma}}, a feature that generates underwater.
* {{EntityLink|Magma Cube}}, a hostile mob found in the Nether.
